mapper.sql: to_char(ID) AS ID, IID, USEMONTH, ACCTYPE4, ACCTYPE9, FLAG, INSERTTIME, UPDATTIME, OPER, RESERVED1, RESERVED3, RESERVED2
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM CRDFEE_RULE_CKJF WHERE 1=1
AND IID = #{iid}
ORDER BY ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CRDFEE_RULE_CKJF (IID, USEMONTH, ACCTYPE4, ACCTYPE9, FLAG, INSERTTIME, UPDATTIME, OPER) VALUES (#{iid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usemonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctype4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctype9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inserttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE CRDFEE_RULE_CKJF SET IID = #{iid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEMONTH = #{usemonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCTYPE4 = #{acctype4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCTYPE9 = #{acctype9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATTIME = #{updattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{updateBy.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
